data.name: MotoGP™21 - VIP Multiplier Pack
data.detailed_description: Purchase the VIP Multiplier Pack! With this special item, your reputation points and the research data that you will collect in the Career mode will double!
data.about_the_game: Purchase the VIP Multiplier Pack! With this special item, your reputation points and the research data that you will collect in the Career mode will double!
data.short_description: Purchase the VIP Multiplier Pack and double your reputation points and the research data in the Career mode.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, AMD FX-6350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 with 2 GB VRAM or more, AMD Radeon HD 7950 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6 GB VRAM or more, AMD Radeon RX 5700 with 6 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
